oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Southern Serenaders performances - tape 1 - 1948-11-30
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 of various performances featuring the Southern Serenaders (performers), as well as Milton Beasley (performer), Eddy Arnold (performer), and Lewis Stanley Jr. (performer) on various dates.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Southern Serenaders; Milton Beasley; Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Have You Ever Been Lonely (Southern Serenaders, Milton Beasley vocals) -- [Unidentified tune] -- [Unidentified tune] -- No One To Cry To (Junior Stanley) -- I'm With A Crowd, But So Alone (Milton Beasley) -- I'm With A Crowd, But So Alone (Milton Beasley) -- Simple Things Are Worth A Million (Milton Beasley) (incomplete) -- I Can Love No One But You (Junior Stanley) (incomplete) -- Watching The Past Go By (Southern Serenaders, Milton Beasley vocals) -- Simple Things Are Worth A Million (Milton Beasley) -- I'm With A Crowd But So Alone (Milton Beasley) -- Blues In My Heart (Southern Serenaders, Lewis Stanley Jr. vocals) -- [Unidentified tune] (Eddy Arnold) -- I Can Love No One But You (Lewis Stanley Jr.) -- Oklahoma Waltz (Lewis Stanley Jr.) -- I'm With A Crowd, But So Alone (Milton Beasley) -- Bitin' My Fingernails Thinking Of You (Milton Beasley) -- [Unidentified instrumental]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Southern Serenaders (Musical group : Bob Dean); Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008;
